# Alcohol consumption subdomain

### **Variable label**:  Current consumption of alcohol  
**Variable name**: lsb_alc_cur_0  
**Variable description**:  Indicator of whether the participant currently consumes alcohol or has consumed alcohol in the past 12 months.  
**Value type**: integer  
**Variable unit**: N/A  
**Category coding**:  

**Code** | **Category Label**  
------------- | -------------  
0 |  Does not currently consume alcohol   
1 |  Currently consumes alcohol  

**Harmonization status**:  complete  
**Harmonization comment**:   How often did you drink alcohol (beer, wine or spirits) during the LAST 14 DAYS?  
**R script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
lsb_HUNT_0$lsb_alc_cur_0<- recode(as.integer(HUNT1$AlcFL2W_NT1BLQ2),'1'=1L,'2'=1L,'3'=1L,'4'=1L,'5'=0L)

```

### **Variable label**:   Ever consumption of alcohol  
**Variable name**: lsb_alc_ever_0    
**Variable description**:  Indicator of whether the participant has ever consumed alcohol.  
**Value type**: integer  
**Variable unit**: N/A  
**Category coding**:  

**Code** | **Category Label**  
------------- | -------------  
0 |   Never consumed alcohol  
1 |   Ever consumed alcohol  

**Harmonization status**:  complete  
**Harmonization comment**:   
**R script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
#Merging the raw tables LASA1B-LASA1H
MyMerge <- function(x,y){
  df <- merge(x,y, by="id",all=TRUE)
  return(df)
}
#Reducing the table to the variables needed
lsb_table_hunt <- Reduce(MyMerge, list(HUNT1,HUNT2,HUNT3))

#hrmonization scripts
lsb_table_hunt$lsb_alc_ever_0<- recode(as.integer(lsb_table_hunt$AlcFL2W_NT1BLQ2),'1'=1L,'2'=1L,'3'=1L,'4'=1L,'5'=0L)
#merging to harmonized table
lsb_HUNT_0<- merge(lsb_HUNT_0,lsb_table_hunt[,c("id","lsb_alc_ever_0")],by="id",all.x=TRUE)
```

### **Variable label**:   Ever consumption of alcohol  
**Variable name**: lsb_alc_ever_2    
**Variable description**:  Indicator of whether the participant has ever consumed alcohol.  
**Value type**: integer  
**Variable unit**: N/A  
**Category coding**:  

**Code** | **Category Label**  
------------- | -------------  
0 |   Never consumed alcohol

**Harmonization status**:  complete  
**Harmonization comment**:   Study-specific variable:"About how often in the last 12 months did you drink alcohol? (Do not include low-alcohol beer)".    
**R script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
#hrmonization scripts
lsb_table_hunt$lsb_alc_ever_2<- ifelse(lsb_table_hunt$lsb_alc_ever_0==0 & as.integer(lsb_table_hunt$AlcFLY_NT3BLQ1)=='8',0L,
                                ifelse(lsb_table_hunt$lsb_alc_ever_0==1 | 
                                (as.integer(lsb_table_hunt$AlcFLY_NT3BLQ1)>='1' & as.integer(lsb_table_hunt$AlcFLY_NT3BLQ1)<=7),1L,NA))
#merging to harmonized table
lsb_HUNT_2<- merge(lsb_HUNT_2,lsb_table_hunt[,c("id","lsb_alc_ever_2")],by="id",all.x=TRUE)
```

# Tobacco consumption subdomain

### **Variable label**:  Current tobacco smoking  
**Variable name**:  lsb_smk_cur_0  
**Variable description**:  Indicator of whether the participant currently smokes any tobacco product.  
**Value type**:  integer  
**Variable unit**:  N/A  
**Category coding**:  

**Code** | **Category Label**  
------------- | -------------  
0 |   Currently does not smoke any tobacco product  
1 |   Currently smokes any tobacco product  

**Harmonization status**:  complete  
**Harmonization comment**:   Smoking status- asks about daily smoking status i.e. currently smokes daily, used to smoke daily, never smoked daily. Missing or NO (value 0) recoded to YES (value 1) if answered YES (value 1) to one of the follow-up questions. OR answered YES to smoking daily in HUNT2 and/or HUNT3 and age when started smoking was before participation age in HUNT1.

Missing recoded to No if reported No to questions on cigarette/pipe and cigars.  
**R script**:   
```{r, echo=TRUE}
lsb_HUNT_0$lsb_smk_cur_0<- recode(as.integer(HUNT1$SmoStat_NT1BLQ2),'0'=0L,'1'=0L,'2'=1L)
```  
### **Variable label**:  Current tobacco smoking

**Value type**:  integer  
**Variable unit**:  N/A  
**Category coding**:
